dao.name: QRY_ADDRESS_DT_SELECT
dao.statement: select trim(nvl(add1_rmk, ' ')||nvl(add2_rmk,' ')||nvl(add3_rmk,' ')) as address from address_dt where trim(cust_cod) = trim(:cust_cod) and trim(add_cod) = trim(:add_cod)

dao.name: QRY_EMAIL
dao.statement: SELECT address_dt.athena_id, address_dt.cust_cod, ADDRESS_RF.ADD_NAM, ADDRESS_DT.ADD_RMK FROM ADDRESS_DT, ADDRESS_RF WHERE ADDRESS_RF.ATHENA_ID = ADDRESS_DT.ATHENA_ID(+) AND ADDRESS_RF.ADD_COD = ADDRESS_DT.ADD_COD(+) AND ADDRESS_RF.GHIST_USE = 'Y' AND ADDRESS_RF.ADD_TYP = 'E' AND ADDRESS_RF.ATHENA_ID = :athena_id AND ADDRESS_DT.CUST_COD(+) = :cust_cod ORDER BY ADDRESS_RF.SEQ_NOS, ADDRESS_RF.ADD_COD

dao.name: QRY_ADDRESS_DT
dao.statement: SELECT address_dt.athena_id "address_dt.athena_id", address_dt.cust_cod "address_dt.cust_cod", ADDRESS_RF.ADD_NAM "ADDRESS_RF.ADD_NAM", ADDRESS_DT.ZIP_COD "ADDRESS_DT.ZIP_COD", ADDRESS_DT.ADD_RMK "ADDRESS_DT.ADD_RMK" FROM ADDRESS_DT, ADDRESS_RF WHERE ADDRESS_RF.ATHENA_ID = ADDRESS_DT.ATHENA_ID(+) AND ADDRESS_RF.ADD_COD = ADDRESS_DT.ADD_COD(+) AND ADDRESS_RF.GHIST_USE = 'Y' AND ADDRESS_RF.ADD_TYP = 'A' AND ADDRESS_RF.ATHENA_ID = :athena_id AND ADDRESS_DT.CUST_COD(+) = :cust_cod ORDER BY ADDRESS_RF.SEQ_NOS, ADDRESS_RF.ADD_COD
